select.if: select role.* from account join account_role on account.is_del = 0 and account_role.account_id = account.id join role on role.is_del = 0 and account_role.role_id=role.id where account.username=#{AccountName}

mapper.update: UPDATE role SET is_del=1 where id=#{role.id}
mapper.select: select menu.id from role join role_menu on role.id = role_menu.role_id and role.is_del = 0 join menu on role_menu.menu_id = menu.id and menu.is_del = 0 where role.id =#{roleid}
